mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.pump_code AS "pumpCode", a.pump_name AS "pumpName", a.comment AS "comment", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM doc_pump a
AND a.pump_code LIKE '%'||#{pumpCode}||'%' '%'+#{pumpCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{pumpCode}, '%')
AND a.pump_name LIKE '%'||#{pumpName}||'%' '%'+#{pumpName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{pumpName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_pump( pump_code, pump_name, comment, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{pumpCode}, #{pumpName}, #{comment}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_pump SET pump_code = #{pumpCode}, pump_name = #{pumpName}, comment = #{comment}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
